instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A2251 820-01949 20v 0.065A
threads.message:
I have a  820-01949 that had spillage around cd3217 area U3100 had 5v. 
Replaced U3100 now getting 20v .065, PPbus_G3h is 12.6v .
Any ideas where to look next?

threads.title: A2251 820-01949 20v 0.065A
threads.message:
I would go for DFU.
If not recognized, then check if all AWAKE and SLPS2R voltages come on and steady.

threads.title: A2251 820-01949 20v 0.065A
threads.message: I need to keep the data DFu will wipe it?

threads.title: A2251 820-01949 20v 0.065A
threads.message:
DFU Restore will erase SSD.
Try Revive option instead...

threads.title: A2251 820-01949 20v 0.065A
threads.message: It goes into DFu no problem but errors out on revive.

threads.title: A2251 820-01949 20v 0.065A
threads.message:
Which coils get voltage on the board?
Check SSD, RAM and CPU coils...
